details:
It was discovered that there was stack-based buffer over-read in memcached,
the in-memory caching server.


* [CVE-2019-15026](https://security-tracker.debian.org/tracker/CVE-2019-15026)
memcached 1.5.16, when UNIX sockets are used, has a stack-based buffer
 over-read in conn\_to\_str in memcached.c.


For Debian 8 Jessie, these problems have been fixed in version
1.4.21-1.1+deb8u3.


We recommend that you upgrade your memcached packages.


Further information about Debian LTS security advisories, how to apply
these updates to your system and frequently asked questions can be
found at: <https://wiki.debian.org/LTS>
